CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
OldVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
OldVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  This release will be generally available to all regions except EU.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
OldVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Personalized Viva Goals Digest Emails
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals activity summary digest emails summarize and curate the most relevant content for users across their Viva Goals experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Personalized Viva Goals Digest Emails
OldVersion.description: Viva Goals activity summary digest emails summarize and curate the most relevant content for users across their Viva Goals experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
OldVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
CurrentVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
OldVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
OldVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
CurrentVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
OldVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Alignment view
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals announces the release of the alignment view, designed to help users visualize how their work contributes to top-level organizational goals more efficiently than ever before. With this revamped experience, users can quickly gain a bird's eye view of their objectives and expand or collapse them to different levels from the chart. This feature will provide users with a more comprehensive understanding of their progress towards team goals, helping them to stay aligned with the teams' objectives.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Alignment view
OldVersion.description: Viva Goals announces the release of the alignment view, designed to help users visualize how their work contributes to top-level organizational goals more efficiently than ever before. With this revamped experience, users can quickly gain a bird's eye view of their objectives and expand or collapse them to different levels from the chart. This feature will provide users with a more comprehensive understanding of their progress towards team goals, helping them to stay aligned with the teams' objectives.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
CurrentVersion.description: From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
OldVersion.description: From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
CurrentVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
OldVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
OldVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
OldVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Making 32-bit Access Large Address Aware (LAA)
CurrentVersion.description: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.

OldVersion.title: Access: Making 32-bit Access Large Address Aware (LAA)
OldVersion.description: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.

CurrentVersion.description: Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

Users can access the

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
OldVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
CurrentVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
OldVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

OldVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint

- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Viva Amplify -  Publish to Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Viva Amplify -  Publish to Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
OldVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
OldVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
OldVersion.description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a weblink to reference files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
OldVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Add new questions to Question Library as Pulse admin
CurrentVersion.description: Pulse admins can create new questions that become available in their users' Question Library.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
OldVersion.description: ,Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
CurrentVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
OldVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
OldVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
OldVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
OldVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as ObjectId, UserKey, UserType, IP Address, DocumentId, SiteId, and AppId.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
OldVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
OldVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Start a new document using up to three files
CurrentVersion.description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for complex formula columns from multiple tables
CurrentVersion.description: Utilize complex formulas such as XLOOKUP and SUMIF to create formula columns bringing together data from multiple tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files to ground prompts in Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files for grounding prompts in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot deployment kits in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: ,Prepare for and launch Copilot in your organization using our new deployment kit in Viva Amplify. This is a set of pre-written and formatted publications that will educate users on how to use Copilot, all of the M365 endpoints, and develop their AI skills. This is a tested set of communications that the Microsoft team used internally to ensure the right messages are reaching your end users and preparing them for Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,DLP will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. On inspection, all the files (of supported file format) within the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies. After, the archive file will get the applicable auditing/enforcement policy applied to it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational messages
CurrentVersion.description: ,Organizational messages allows enterprises to connect with their organization through customized messages, enabling them to engage directly within the Microsoft product experiences they use every day, like Windows Spotlight.  Starting Spring 2024, Organizational messages will be found under the “Reports” section within the Microsoft 365 admin center and will include features for admins to centrally manage their tenant’s messages, create new messages, and review delivery reports.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - General Security Policy Violations
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - General Security Policy Violations
OldVersion.description: ,Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.description:
,
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by departing users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
"Detects security violations by departing users near their resignation or termination date. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by departing users
OldVersion.description: ,"Detects security violations by departing users near their resignation or termination date. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
OldVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Connectors (Line Anchoring)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will provide the ability to create more effective flowcharts and diagrams by allowing you to anchor lines between different shapes, making them move and reroute along with connected shapes.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  Only available in the United States.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  This release will be generally available to all regions except EU.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Personalized Viva Goals Digest Emails
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals activity summary digest emails summarize and curate the most relevant content for users across their Viva Goals experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
CurrentVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
CurrentVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Alignment view
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals announces the release of the alignment view, designed to help users visualize how their work contributes to top-level organizational goals more efficiently than ever before. With this revamped experience, users can quickly gain a bird's eye view of their objectives and expand or collapse them to different levels from the chart. This feature will provide users with a more comprehensive understanding of their progress towards team goals, helping them to stay aligned with the teams' objectives.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
CurrentVersion.description: From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
CurrentVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Making 32-bit Access Large Address Aware (LAA)
CurrentVersion.description: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
CurrentVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva:  Viva Amplify -  Publish to Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Campaign members can now additionally publish their publication to Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a weblink to reference files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Add new questions to Question Library as Pulse admin
CurrentVersion.description: Pulse admins can create new questions that become available in their users' Question Library.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
CurrentVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Start a new document using up to three files
CurrentVersion.description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can block top level domain addresses within Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for complex formula columns from multiple tables
CurrentVersion.description: Utilize complex formulas such as XLOOKUP and SUMIF to create formula columns bringing together data from multiple tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files to ground prompts in Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files for grounding prompts in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot deployment kits in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: ,Prepare for and launch Copilot in your organization using our new deployment kit in Viva Amplify. This is a set of pre-written and formatted publications that will educate users on how to use Copilot, all of the M365 endpoints, and develop their AI skills. This is a tested set of communications that the Microsoft team used internally to ensure the right messages are reaching your end users and preparing them for Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,DLP will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. On inspection, all the files (of supported file format) within the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies. After, the archive file will get the applicable auditing/enforcement policy applied to it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational messages
CurrentVersion.description: ,Organizational messages allows enterprises to connect with their organization through customized messages, enabling them to engage directly within the Microsoft product experiences they use every day, like Windows Spotlight.  Starting Spring 2024, Organizational messages will be found under the “Reports” section within the Microsoft 365 admin center and will include features for admins to centrally manage their tenant’s messages, create new messages, and review delivery reports.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - General Security Policy Violations
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by departing users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
"Detects security violations by departing users near their resignation or termination date. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.
